name: I I R O
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 46 (JAM 72h)
Made by Dis0rder & Ankea - April 2020 -
The Ludum Dare - entry page
* * *
I I R O is a collection of four separate minigames, bundled in a spooky package.
Includes a short stop-motion introduction, and a “level-hub” unlike any you have seen before!
Collect all the four tokens to set your soul to rest, and try not to get cursed in the process!
* * *
Controls:
Enter
Arrow keys
Left mouse button
* * *
